Package io.tweetninja.cli.Util

Class ConsoleDropdown

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.tweetninja.cli.Util.ConsoleDropdown
  • public class ConsoleDropdown
extends java.lang.Object
    ConsoleDropdown is a class that when given an array of options can later be called with ConsoleDropdown#read() to create an interactive prompt which returns the selected option the user chose.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  ConsoleDropdown.Option
      ConsoleDropdown.Option is a class that describes a selectable option to be used in a ConsoleDropdown

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ConsoleDropdown​(ConsoleDropdown.Option... options)
      Creates a new ConsoleDropdown instantiated with given options

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static ConsoleDropdown of​(java.lang.Object... entries)
      Generates a dropdown containing the given objects by generating a name automatically, searching for name, getName, or toString methods in that order.
      static ConsoleDropdown of​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> entries)
      Generates a dropdown containing the given objects by generating a name automatically, searching for name, getName, or toString methods in that order.
      static ConsoleDropdown of​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> mappings)
      Generates a dropdown containing the given objects mapped to their given name.
      java.util.Optional<java.lang.Object> read()
      The most useful method of a ConsoleDropdown, which creates a blocking prompt and returns the selected object, if any
      void setSelectedOption​(java.lang.Object value)
      Manually sets the currently selected option.
      void setSelectedOptionIndex​(int i)
      Manually sets the currently selected option.

        public static ConsoleDropdown of​(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> mappings)
        Generates a dropdown containing the given objects mapped to their given name.
        Parameters:
        mappings - A map connecting a pretty name to each selectable object
        Returns:
        A dropdown containing the given objects

      • of

        public static ConsoleDropdown of​(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> entries)
        Generates a dropdown containing the given objects by generating a name automatically, searching for name, getName, or toString methods in that order.
        Parameters:
        entries - A list of objects selectable in this dropdown
        Returns:
        A dropdown containing the given objects

      • read

        public java.util.Optional<java.lang.Object> read()
        The most useful method of a ConsoleDropdown, which creates a blocking prompt and returns the selected object, if any
        Returns:
        The selected object, or null, wrapped in an Optional

      • setSelectedOptionIndex

        public void setSelectedOptionIndex​(int i)
        Manually sets the currently selected option. Mostly an internal function.
        Parameters:
